text.title: Pro-government forces in Iraq launch operation to reclaim Ramadi from Islamic State
text.head: Pro-government forces in Iraq launch operation to reclaim Ramadi from Islamic State
Sources

list.item: AFP /Reuters. "Islamic State: Iraqi forces close in on Ramadi ahead of major assault" — ABC News (Australia) , May 27, 2015
"Iraq Shi'ite militia take lead in campaign to reverse Islamic State gains" — SBS World News , May 27, 2015
"Iraq starts operation to drive Islamic State from Anbar" — BBC News Online , May 26, 2015
Ammar Al Shamary. "Iraq starts operation to rid Ramadi of Islamic State" — USA Today , May 26, 2015
Patrick J. McDonnell and W.J. Hennigan. "Iraq offensive underway to take back Ramadi from Islamic State" — Los Angeles Times , May 26, 2015
"U.S. to deliver 2,000 anti-tank weapons to Iraq, Pentagon says" — Reuters , May 21, 2015
